dso 0.7

Reproduce a dso stage

repro.Rd

Reproduce a dso stage with or without its dependencies.

Usage

repro(stage_path = stage_here(), single_stage = F)

Arguments

stage_path

The path to a stage. Defaults to the current stage by using `stage_here()`.

single_stage

Logical flag indicating whether to reproduce only the current stage (`TRUE`) or the current stage with all dependencies (`FALSE`). Defaults to `FALSE`.

Details

This function reproduces a stage specified by `stage_path`. If `single_stage` is set to `TRUE`, it reproduces the stage without its dependencies. Otherwise, it reproduces the current stage along with all its dependency stages. By default, the current stage will be reproduced.
